response.overview: Here is my 1985 full comedy movie based on the true saga of Apollo 13. It was the 3rd moon mission on their way to the moon.Peacefully cruising toward the moon.Then on April 13 1970 when they were halfway between Earth and moon.An Explosion!! Instead of a moon mission,it became a historic rescue  mission that end in triumph.so sit back an enjoy. this movie is done in old VSH video stop action. All cells hand panted and filmed by me.This is my 54 anniversary of my Apollo 13 cartoons.  April ,27.1970 tats when I draw them in to cartoon.
response.title: APOLLO 13 the legacy lives on
